name: Fake Out
desc: Mr. Mime claps, damaging and knocking back enemies hit.

name: Light Screen
desc: Mr. Mime creates a wall that prevents enemies from passing. If an enemy is near the location where the wall is created, they are shoved and left unable to act for a short time.

name: Confusion
description: Mr. Mime fires a wave of psychic energy, damaging and knocking enemies back. Enemies hit into a wall take bonus damage and are stunned for 1.5s. Enemies debuffed by Power Swap take bonus damage and are stunned, but are not knocked back.

name: Psychic
description: Mr. Mime. pulses energy, dealing damage in an area around themself, any target affected by Power Swap, and any Barriers or Light Screens. After three pulses, a final pulse will damage enemies and stun them for 1s. Enemies hit by the pulses have their SpDef lowered by 5% for each hit.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Enemies hit by the pulses are additionally slowed by 30%.

name: Barrier
description: Mr. Mime creates a wall that prevents enemies from passing. If an enemy is near the location where the wall is created, they are shoved and left unable to act for a short time. Holds 2 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 2s.

name: Power Swap
description:
Creates a link between Mr. Mime and the target this move hits. While the link holds, Mr. Mime's movement speed increases by 15% and their HP is continually restored. The link will continue to hold for as long as the linked target stays in range or until another target is Power Swapped. Damage and healing ticks at a rate of 0.5s. 

If the linked target is an ally, this move increases their movement speed by 15%, increases the amount of damage they deal by 15%, and continually restores their HP. If the linked target is an enemy, this move decreases their movement speed by 15%, decreases the amount of damage they deal by 15% and deals damage over time to them. Power Swap can be cleansed.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: Increases the amount of damage dealt by allies to 20% and further strengthens the debuff to enemies, making them deal 20% less damage.

name: Showtime
desc: Mr. Mime leaps forward and begins a performance; stunning enemies for .5s, dealing damage in a large area around him 4 times, and becomes unstoppable for the duration. The final hit deals double damage.
